channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: C’est le dernier jour du Black Friday : voici les ultimes offres de ce dimanche 30 novembre 2025
item.description: Entre les offres en avant-première, les promos du 11.11 ou encore la Black Week, le mois de novembre a été assez mouvementé en offres. Mais, ce n'est pas encore fini : c'est aujourd'hui le dernier jour du Black Friday et il y a encore de nouvelles offres qui tombent. Nous avons fait le tri des meilleures promotions Tech, faites vous plaisir !

item.title: Cyber Monday 75-inch TV deals: the 6 best big-screen discounts
item.description: Affordable smart TVs to high-end OLEDs, we've picked the best 75-inch and 77-inch TVs whatever your budget.

item.title: Bambu Lab A1 mini avec AMS Lite : l’imprimante 3D parfaite pour débuter est à un super prix
item.description: Oubliez les heures passées à régler un plateau avec une feuille de papier. La Bambu Lab A1 mini, accompagnée de son module AMS Lite pour imprimer en couleur, tombe à 289 €. Si vous voulez vous lancer dans l'impression 3D sans devenir mécanicien, c'est la seule machine à considérer.

item.title: Dell says businesses still aren't moving to Windows 11 fast enough - PC maker says sales will be flat as many stick with Windows 10
item.description: Dell reports slow Windows 11 adoption and continued hardware shortages as companies delay PC upgrades across global markets.

item.title: ChatGPT launched three years ago today
item.description: It’s no hyperbole to suggest that ChatGPT subsequently transformed the worlds of business and tech.

item.title: This deal on smart glasses was too good for my husband to pass up
item.description: The last thing I need is a new Amazon Echo smart speaker. As The Verge’s smart home reviewer, I currently have a dozen scattered around my home for testing. But when Amazon’s Echo Frames smart glasses went on sale for $115 for Cyber Monday, down from $300, it was an offer my husband couldn’t refuse. […]

item.title: Claudia Black Exits ‘Ahsoka’ Season 2 Over Alleged Pay Disputes
item.description: Black won't be reprising her role as Klothow, one of the new Nightsisters introduced in the first 'Ahsoka' season.

item.title: My favorite snore-blocking sleepbuds are down to their lowest price
item.description: Anker’s seriously small Soundcore Sleep A20 sleepbuds can be nabbed for $108 right now at Amazon, their best price since they launched on Kickstarter at $90 last year. They normally sell for $179.99, making this a standout deal for a pair of ultra-tiny sleep buds that I barely notice as I drift off to the […]

item.title: Guerre des étoiles « made in France », épisode IV : un œil sur les missiles
item.description: Comment est-on au courant si un pays ennemi nous envoie un missile ? C’est ce que l’on appelle l’alerte avancée. Mais l’Europe n’en dispose pas aujourd’hui et dépend du partage des informations de la part des États-Unis. À l’heure où la Russie multiplie les intimidations, la France et...

item.title: I hope you didnt buy the Bose QuietComfort headphones on Black Friday. Theyre $199 off today.

item.title: LaLiga football streaming behind Cloudflare weekend outages as Spaniards turn to Proton VPN
item.description: LaLiga anti-piracy blocking keeps affecting Cloudflare domains in Spain, with Proton VPN usage continuing to soar. If you aren't a subscriber yet, you can now save 75% with Proton's Black Friday deal.

item.description: The 13-inch M4 Apple MacBook Air is on sale for just $738.04 during Amazon's Cyber Monday sale. It's cheaper now than it was on Black Friday.
